page.title: 09 TRANSPORT IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content:
Our village is small and the only way to get to the nearest town is by some form of transport.Nearly all the people have cars, but the people that have no cars go on the mini bus. But if their husbands go to work in the car they go on the mini bus to do the shoping. Some people who do not have a car or do not use the mini bus go on a bike or a motor cycle.When we go on trips we have a coach.Some people walk. There are no trains in our village but the railway line goes past Winsham,the nearest station is Crewkerne.
By Craig Salter
